tasks.label: launch qemu
tasks.command: orb make image && echo Starting QEMU && qemu-system-i386 -drive format=raw,file=a.img,if=floppy -drive format=raw,file=80m.img,if=ide -boot a -s -S

tasks.label: build image
tasks.command: orb build image && x86_64-elf-objcopy --only-keep-debug kernel.bin kernel.debug && x86_64-elf-objcopy --strip-debug kernel.bin
